view

类 ReversiView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ReversiView

  • public class ReversiView
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the view of the Reversi game which is not only get the input from the user, but also to print the outputs.
    作者:
    Jerry Zhu

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReversiView()
      This is the constructor of the view which initialize a menu and print it out.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void askInput()
      This method will ask the user a position.
      void ComputerStatistic(Point p)
      This method will print the point that the computer player put.
      java.lang.String getInput()
      This method is to get input from the users.
      void printException()
      This method is to print a message when catches a exception.
      void printResult(int player, int computer, ReversiModel model)
      This method is to print the final result of the game.
      void printStatistics(int score1, int score2)
      This method is to ask the user for another input.
      void printTable(ReversiModel model)
      This method is to print the current table.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ReversiView

        public ReversiView()
        This is the constructor of the view which initialize a menu and print it out.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInput

        public java.lang.String getInput()
        This method is to get input from the users.
        返回:
        Each command entered by the users.

      • printTable

        public void printTable(ReversiModel model)
        This method is to print the current table.
        参数:
        model - The current model which contains a table.

      • askInput

        public void askInput()
        This method will ask the user a position.

      • ComputerStatistic

        public void ComputerStatistic(Point p)
        This method will print the point that the computer player put.
        参数:
        p -

      • printStatistics

        public void printStatistics(int score1,
                            int score2)
        This method is to ask the user for another input.
        参数:
        score1 - The user's score.
        score2 - The computer's score.

      • printException

        public void printException()
        This method is to print a message when catches a exception.

      • printResult

        public void printResult(int player,
                        int computer,
                        ReversiModel model)
        This method is to print the final result of the game.
        参数:
        player - The score that the player get on the game.
        computer - The score that the computer get on the game.
